ygData.subject: Request for Upper Gukk Spoiler - Bard Related
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone can help, you can either email me direct or post here with appropriate spoiler warning. Thanks!!!! I am looking for the Elfhide Gloves in Upper Guk.
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone can help, you can either email me direct or post here with
appropriate spoiler warning. Thanks!!!!

I am looking for the Elfhide Gloves in Upper Guk. These are the +5 Agi and
+5 dex gloves useble ONLY by Bards and Rogues. I was TOLD that they are on
someone named "The Warden", who is supposedly the Warden of the jail cells
in Upper Gukk. My group camped there for QUITE a long time this evening and
never saw him once. Does anyone know exaclty where he spawns? Is there some
sort of trigger? We kept seeing Knights and Warriors, but never a Warden.

We are ALSO looking for the trollhide belt. Again, I was told this SAME
invidual bears it. Is this true? If not, who has it, and where? And of
course, is this ALSO a Bard/Rogue only item?

THANK YOU for any help you can provide!

Tim - Tallonn - Bertox
my e-mail: timandmary@...
